post.author: 권칠환
post.content:
We're currently working with an established software development and IT consulting firm in Bermuda, seeking a Senior .NET Developer to join their team on the Island.

Relocation assistance, health benefits and a competitive and nearly completely tax-free (4.75% tax) compensation package will be offered to the successful candidate. As well, it would be extremely helpful if you have outside interests that lend themselves to this beautiful and idyllic living environment.



I've attached details of the role for your review. If this is something you would be interested in exploring, I'd be happy to speak in detail.


Thanks Chilhoan,

Jessica Poulsen
Squires Resources Inc.
705.725.7660 ext. 22
877.435.0921 toll free from Toronto
jessica@squiresresources.com
www.squiresresources.com
Become a Fan of Squires Resources on Facebook
post.title: Senior .NET Developer Opportunity
